default_language.text: The language that will be given to new members.
delete_account.text: Want to permanently delete your Cella account? Use the button below. Please note that this action is irreversible.
delete_organization_notice.text: As an admin you can permanently delete the organization {{name}}. All members will loose access to this organization and its data. Please note that this action is irreversible.
delete_workspace_notice.text: As an admin you can permanently delete the workspace {{name}}. All members will loose access to this workspace and its data. Please note that this action is irreversible.

onboarding_welcome.text: A no-nonsense TypeScript template to build modern web apps in a matter of weeks. Ready to implement. MIT license.
onboarding_step2: Let's get started by creating your organization.
onboarding_step3: Invite one or more team members of {{organizationName}} to Cella.

success.newsletter_sign_up: Thanks for requesting info about Cella!
onboarding_completed.text: Have a look at the demo project in your menu.
system_panel.text: System admins can manage and monitor all organizations and their members.
title: Title
under_construction.text: Cella is a work in progress. This site shows how we are building a task board app with cella as a template. Currently, the development of both cella and the task board app are happening in the same repo. These developments and the code will be split once cella is stable and ready for releases. Stable means cella has passed a security audit, has a stable API, automated tests, proper versioning (currently its prerelease). Contact us if you are interested in collaborating!
upload_img_max_10mb.text: Upload a PNG or JPEG under 10MB
user_handle.text: A unique handle for your profile URL
verify_email_notice.text: We sent you an email. Please check your inbox and click on the link to verify your email address.
